name: Rabbit Empire:Idle Game
description:
Rabbit Empire is an idle game that simulates the development of civilization. Through simple operations, develop and manage agriculture and other industries, obtain wealth, research and develop technology, build up military, expand territory, and lead civilization to a new era!

Features:
【Build your rabbit empire】Develop Agriculture, Industry, Technology. From the Barbaric Age to the Space Age.
【Idle games Easy Casual】Collect resources Automatically. Easy money Easy fun.
【Unlock the epic cards】Let those Great rabbits in history work for you, they will boost your development in many fields..
【Draw and battle】You have a good mind and use your strategies to win the war!

Contact us:
